short_summary: Construction services for wharf reconstruction in Parker's Cove, Nova Scotia
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.
full_summary:
### Wharf Reconstruction - Parker's Cove

#### Reference Number: WS3648812166 - Doc3662894195
#### Solicitation Number: WS3648812166

#### Publication Date: 2022-09-13
#### Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-29T14:00:00 (ADT)
#### Expected Contract Start Date: 2022-10-31
#### Expected Contract End Date: None (indeterminate)

#### Procurement Overview:

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires a contractor to provide construction services for wharf reconstruction in Parker's Cove, Nova Scotia. The scope of work encompasses:

- Demolition of an existing timber-piled wharf structure and construction of a new steel-piled wharf structure with a concrete deck
- Encapsulation of an existing marginal timber structure in a new steel pile structure
- Removal of timber decking from an existing timber crib structure, raising it by one meter, and installing a new concrete deck

The estimated cost for this procurement is between $5,000,000 and $20,000,000. The contractor must complete the work within 72 weeks of award notification.

#### Technical and Contractual Information:

All inquiries and questions regarding technical aspects and contractual matters should be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Richard Parsons, at [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Procurement Details:

* Procurement Category: CNST (Construction Services)
* Procurement Method: Open bidding (Competitive)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Nova Scotia
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia

#### Contact Information:

* Name: Richard Parsons (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

#### Additional Resources:
